events.name: Launch Workshop - MINDEF IoT Challenge
events.description:
The Launch Workshop, Monday, 15 August, is designed to give you an introduction to the themes and challenges (below) of the MINDEF IoT Challenge, and explore how MINDEF can enhance their operations using new solutions powered by the Internet of Things. 
At the workshop, you will get a chance to hear from eleven MINDEF business teams about their specific challenges in the following areas: 

Learn more about the challenges here. 
The Launch Workshop will also be an excellent opportunity for you to meet like-minded innovators, and form teams for the next stage of the competition. We will also share more information about the competition process. 
Tech Workshops
We have also organised tech workshops with our technology partners, IBM Bluemix as well as Oracle, who will share their unique expertise with you and take you through hands-on tutorials, where you can learn how to use their respective platforms to power IoT-based solutions. 
More Information
To learn more about the MINDEF IoT Challenge, visit the microsite here.
events.location: The Meeting Point, Blk 73B Ayer Rajah Crescent, Singapore 139957
